content.text:
# 2021 CONCACAF Awards

| host             =
| former name      =
| preshow_host     =
| acts             =

| runtime          =
| previous         = 2018
| main             = CONCACAF Awards
| next             = 2022
}}
The shortlists for the 2021 CONCACAF Awards were announced on 4 February 2022. The results were announced on 4 April 2022. The ceremony was streamed on YouTube.
